data.name: DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2 - Anime Music Pack 2
data.detailed_description:
Note that songs included are their respective abridged versions.

You must have the full retail version of the game to use this content. Additionally, you must be playing on the latest version of the game to access the content.

Spice up Conton City and in-game battles with this pack of songs from DRAGON BALL Z, DRAGON BALL Z Kai, and DRAGON BALL Super!

Songs included:
- CHOUZETSU☆DYNAMIC! by Kazuya Yoshii
- GENKAI TOPPA × SURVIVOR by Kiyoshi Hikawa
- YOKA YOKA DANCE by Batten Showjo Tai
- HERO ～Kibou no Uta～ by FLOW
- DRAGON SOUL by Takayoshi Tanimoto
- UNMEINO HI ～TAMASHII VS TAMASHII～ by Hironobu Kageyama
- KYUUKYOKUNO BATTLE (Instrumental)
- MOETSUKIRO!! NESSEN RESSEN CHOU GEKISEN BGM
- SHIO YOBU CELL GAME
- TENKA WAKEMENO CHOUKESSEN!!
- DRAGON BALL Z BGM

data.short_description: Spice up Conton City and in-game battles with this pack of songs from DRAGON BALL Z, DRAGON BALL Z Kai, and DRAGON BALL Super!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and higher (64 bit only)
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X2 550, 3.1GHz | Intel Pentium G4400, 3.30GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 650 | Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470, 3.20GHz | AMD FX-6300, 3.5Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 660 | Radeon HD 7770
  • DirectX: Version 11
